title: Raymond in talks to sign Rs 5k - cr joint realty pacts
body_text:
Raymond in talks to sign Rs 5k-cr joint realty pacts
Raymond, a textile-to-engineering company, is betting big on the real estate boom by signing joint development agreements worth Rs 5,000 crore with landowners. They plan to open 300 stores in FY25, with a focus on ethnic wear stores. The company is also expanding its production capacity and exploring inorganic growth opportunities.
